title: Farewell, comet 3I/ATLAS! Interstellar visitor heads for the outer solar system after its closest approach to Earth
description: 3I/ATLAS has now made its closest approach to the sun and Earth and is now heading back out toward the outer solar system.
content: 3I/ATLAS has now made its closest approach to the sun and Earth and is now heading back out toward the outer solar system.
